TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit FederatedPassiveSecurityTokenServiceOperations extends System.Object

summary.span: 公共类封装操作通常由 Federated Passive Security Token Service 执行。

span.span: A utility class that encapsulates the operations typically performed by a Federated Passive Security Token Service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当实现被动安全令牌服务 (STS)，调用此类从你的代码隐藏以调用自定义 STS 来处理传入的实例公开的静态方法 WS 联合身份验证请求消息。When implementing a passive security token service (STS), call the static methods exposed by this class from your code-behind to invoke an instance of your custom STS to process an incoming WS-Federation request message. 由派生自实现自定义 STS类。You implement a custom STS by deriving from the class. ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义的被动 STS 处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

summary.span: 处理传入 WS-Federation Passive Protocol 请求。

span.span: Processes an incoming WS-Federation Passive Protocol request.

remarks.format: ## Examples 本主题中使用的代码示例摘自`Custom Token`示例。The code example that is used in this topic is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供使处理的简单 Web 令牌 (SWT) 的自定义类，并包括一个实现被动 STS，能够为提供服务的 SWT 令牌。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT), and it includes an implementation of a passive STS that is capable of serving an SWT token. 有关此示例，并提供其他示例的 WIF 和有关从哪里下载它们，请参阅[WIF 代码示例索引](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and about where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](~/docs/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index.md). 下面的代码演示如何调用自定义的被动 STS 处理 WS 联合身份验证请求，通过调用方法中的代码后面`default.aspx.cs`文件。The following code shows how to invoke a custom passive STS to process a WS-Federation request by calling the method from the code behind in the `default.aspx.cs` file. [!code-csharp[WIFCustomTokenSTS#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifcustomtokensts/cs/passivests/default.aspx.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法此典型用法就是到进程从某个重载返回方法。This typical usage of this method is to process the returned from one of the overloaded methods.
